name: Reflection of Loneliness
description:
Alexandra inherits a mansion from her Grandmother. But the attic holds a secret that will change Alexandra's future.

Credits:

  • Anna ‘Lavinnia’ Kończak (Director and Writer) 
  • Connor ‘Ragnia’ Sullivan (Editor)

  • Akua (Character Artist)
  • Lena (Background Artist)
  • Simon Zaleski (Music and Sound Design)
  • Maxadrian Burton (Voice Actor: Alex)
